original_text: If it was not useful for anything when it was whole, how much less can it be made into something useful when the fire has burned it and it is charred?
korean_text: 그것이 온전할 때에도 아무 제조에 합당하지 아니하였거든 하물며 불에 살라지고 탄 후에 어찌 제조에 합당하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If it was not useful for anything
how much less can it be made into something useful
sentences.korean_translation: 얼마나 더 적게 그것을 유용한 무언가로 만들 수 있겠는가

sentences.original_text: when the fire has burned it
